stones.name: Rose Quartz
stones.description: A beautiful pale pink stone known as the 'love stone'. Found in Brazil, this specimen has a gentle, translucent quality with soft internal patterns. Rose quartz is believed to promote emotional healing and self-love.

stones.name: Amethyst Cluster
stones.description: A stunning deep purple amethyst cluster with perfect crystal formations. This piece showcases the natural beauty of Uruguay's amethyst caves, with rich violet hues and exceptional clarity.

stones.name: Tiger's Eye
stones.description: A golden-brown chatoyant stone with silky luster and distinctive banding. This tiger's eye specimen displays beautiful golden and brown striations that seem to shimmer in the light.

stones.name: Lapis Lazuli
stones.description: A deep blue metamorphic rock with flecks of gold pyrite. This ancient stone was prized by Egyptian royalty and continues to captivate with its celestial blue color and golden inclusions.

stones.name: Green Aventurine
stones.description: A translucent green stone with a gentle shimmer caused by mica inclusions. This aventurine specimen has a soothing forest green color and smooth, polished surface that feels wonderful to touch.
